body: I was banned by PeachyYas. Then I posted email to directors or  I dont know who checks it. NO ANSWER -  I think more than 1 WEEK. Was it accepted or not?
body_tagged: I was banned by PeachyYas. Then I posted email to directors or  I dont know who checks it. NO ANSWER -  I think more than 1 WEEK. Was it accepted or not?
title: Need answer!

replies.body: It could take them longer, if they still haven't read it after 2 weeks resend the email.
replies.body_tagged: It could take them longer, if they still haven't read it after 2 weeks resend the email.

replies.body:
Managers+ check them +random hobos(Wait, wha?) they will tell you if it accepted or not.
EDIT:not necessarily if they don't accept it.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: If your email hasn't been read for a while, a week or so, then you can resend it. Emails can be easily lost and your not the only one who has had this problem. Your appeal will be read, don't worry :D
replies.body_tagged: If your email hasn't been read for a while, a week or so, then you can resend it. Emails can be easily lost and your not the only one who has had this problem. Your appeal will be read, don't worry :D

replies.body: Peachy had to have valid proof to ban you. If you aren't accepted they probably won't answer your email. But if you think you deserve and answer after a while just send the email again.
replies.body_tagged: Peachy had to have valid proof to ban you. If you aren't accepted they probably won't answer your email. But if you think you deserve and answer after a while just send the email again.
